signaturePlatters.name: Royal Biryani Platter
signaturePlatters.description: A true feast fit for royalty! Fragrant basmati rice, slow-cooked to perfection with a rich blend of traditional spices, layered with tender meat, flavorful chicken, and juicy kebabs. Served with refreshing raita, crisp salad, and tangy chutney to elevate every bite. This platter is the perfect choice for sharing with family and friends, bringing a touch of royalty to your dining experience.

signaturePlatters.name: Tandoori Feast
signaturePlatters.description: A sizzling spread straight from the clay oven! Succulent chicken tikka, smoky seekh kebabs, tender malai boti, and juicy fish tikka, all marinated in aromatic spices and grilled to perfection. Served hot with naan, mint chutney, fresh salad, and raita, this platter is a celebration of bold flavors and irresistible tandoori aromas. Perfect for sharing and making every meal unforgettable.

signaturePlatters.name: Vegetarian Delight
signaturePlatters.description: A wholesome feast crafted for veggie lovers! A vibrant selection of flavorful vegetable biryani, crispy pakoras, paneer tikka, and aromatic mixed vegetable curry, served alongside fresh salad, mint chutney, and raita. This platter is a perfect balance of taste, health, and tradition — making it a delightful choice for a truly satisfying vegetarian experience.

specialOffers.name: Family Feast Deal
specialOffers.description: Perfect for family gatherings! Includes 2 appetizers, 3 main courses, rice, naan, and dessert for 4 people.

specialOffers.name: Date Night Special
specialOffers.description: Romantic dinner for two with wine pairing. Includes appetizers, main courses, and a shared dessert.
